justification: “Tehrani & Yamini (2020) systematically characterize the link between personality traits, as measured by the Five-Factor Personality Inventory…”

measured_by: Peer-rated subtraction-after-ranking procedure in the Chabu Ratings Data
justification: “Peer-raters ranked participants … on a series of psycho-social traits … The sample includes … peer-ratings for conflict resolution…”

measured_by: Peer-rated subtraction-after-ranking procedure in the Chabu Ratings Data
justification: “Peer-raters ranked participants … on a series of psycho-social traits associated with leadership (Table 1) using a … subtraction-after-ranking procedure. These rankings were then converted to relative ranks (0-1).”
construct: Psycho-social leadership traits (allies, kin, farming, decisions, expertise, intelligence, likable, prosocial, respect, feared, fighting)
